QuestData.Title: Hot Pursuit
QuestData.Description: Priscilla's escaping on horseback! Grab one of our chargers and chase her down!
QuestData.LogDescription: Mount a Proudmoore Charger and chase Priscilla Ashvane.
QuestData.RewardText: I don't know how anyone could survive a fall like that.$B$BStill, we should be careful not to let our guard down.
